files.name: NavigationMenu.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuRoot,
  type NavigationMenuRootEmits,
  type NavigationMenuRootProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';
import NavigationMenuViewport from './NavigationMenuViewport.vue';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<NavigationMenuRootEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuRoot
    v-bind="forwarded"
    :class="cn('relative z-10 flex max-w-max flex-1 items-center justify-center', $attrs.class ?? '')"
  >
    <slot />
    <NavigationMenuViewport />
  </NavigationMenuRoot>
</template>

files.name: NavigationMenuContent.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuContent,
  type NavigationMenuContentEmits,
  type NavigationMenuContentProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuContentProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<NavigationMenuContentEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuContent
    v-bind="forwarded"
    class="sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content"
  >
    <slot />
  </NavigationMenuContent>
</template>

<style>
.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  animation: fade-out 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-state="open"] {
  animation: fade-in 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="from-end"][data-state="open"] {
  animation: slide-in-from-right 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="from-start"][data-state="open"] {
  animation: slide-in-from-left 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="to-end"][data-state="closed"] {
  animation: slide-out-to-right 200ms ease-in-out;
}

.sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content[data-motion="to-start"][data-state="closed"] {
  animation: slide-out-to-left 200ms ease-in-out;
}

@media (width >= 768px) {
  .sigma-ui-navigation-menu-content {
    position: absolute;
    width: auto;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-in {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes fade-out {
  from {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  to {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes slide-in-from-right {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(13rem);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-in-from-left {
  from {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-13rem);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-out-to-right {
  from {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(13rem);
  }
}

@keyframes slide-out-to-left {
  from {
    filter: blur(0);
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateX(0);
  }

  to {
    filter: blur(12px);
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateX(-13rem);
  }
}
</style>

files.name: NavigationMenuIndicator.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { NavigationMenuIndicator, type NavigationMenuIndicatorProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuIndicatorProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuIndicator
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="cn('top-full z-[1] flex h-1.5 items-end justify-center overflow-hidden data-[state=visible]:animate-in data-[state=hidden]:animate-out data-[state=hidden]:fade-out data-[state=visible]:fade-in', $attrs.class ?? '')"
  >
    <div class="relative top-[60%] h-2 w-2 rotate-45 rounded-tl-sm bg-border shadow-md" />
  </NavigationMenuIndicator>
</template>

files.name: NavigationMenuList.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { NavigationMenuList, type NavigationMenuListProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuListProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>

    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="
      cn(
        'group flex flex-1 list-none items-center justify-center gap-x-1',
        $attrs.class ?? '',
      )
    "

files.name: NavigationMenuTrigger.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  NavigationMenuTrigger,
  type NavigationMenuTriggerProps,
  useForwardProps,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { ChevronDownIcon } from 'lucide-vue-next';
import { navigationMenuTriggerStyle } from '.';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<NavigationMenuTriggerProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <NavigationMenuTrigger
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="cn(navigationMenuTriggerStyle(), 'group', $attrs.class ?? '')"
  >
    <slot />
    <ChevronDownIcon
      class="relative top-px ml-1 h-3 w-3 transition duration-200 group-data-[state=open]:rotate-180"
      aria-hidden="true"
    />
  </NavigationMenuTrigger>
</template>
